terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.1_user_eligibility:
User Eligibility
To use the Platform, you must be at least 16 years old or have the permission of a parent or legal guardian. You agree to provide accurate, complete, and current information when creating an account.
terms.2_booking_and_payments:
Booking and Payments
All bookings made through our Platform are subject to availability and acceptance by the stables or service providers (‚ÄúPartners‚Äù).
The stable has the right to downgrade the horse level in case of losing control.
Only one user can ride a horse; not allowed for two users to ride one horse.
Payments are processed securely via our integrated payment gateway. Your payment information is not stored on our servers.
We are only using our integrated payment gateway and we don‚Äôt allow or accept any other payment methods.
Prices listed are set by our Partners and may vary by location, type of ride, duration, and services offered.
Price vary upon nationality according to the Ministry of Tourism.
You should bring your ID during the ride.
terms.3_cancellations_and_refunds:
Cancellations and Refunds
Cancellations made 24 hours before the scheduled ride are eligible for a full refund (100% refund).
50% refund available on more than 3 hours before booking and up to 24 hours before booking.
Late cancellations or no-shows may result in no refund.
In the case of bad weather or safety concerns, Partners reserve the right to reschedule or cancel rides with a full refund or rescheduling option.
terms.4_assumption_of_risk:
Assumption of Risk
Horse riding is an inherently risky activity. By booking through our Platform, you acknowledge and accept the risks involved. Neither we nor our Partners are responsible for injuries, accidents, or property damage that may occur during rides.
We highly recommend all riders wear appropriate safety gear, including helmets, and follow the instructions of the riding staff at all times.
terms.5_partner_responsibility:
Partner Responsibility
Our Partners are independent operators and are solely responsible for quality and delivery of their services. We do not directly own or operate any stables or horses.
terms.6_user_conduct:
User Conduct
You agree to:
- Use the Platform only for lawful purposes.
- Not interfere with or disrupt the Platform or services.
- Not provide false, misleading, or harmful content or reviews.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that violates these Terms.
terms.7_intellectual_property:
Intellectual Property
All content on our Platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Jawad or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
terms.8_limitation_of_liability:
Limitation of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by law, Jawad is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Platform or any booked services.
terms.9_privacy_policy:
Privacy Policy
Your use of our Platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
terms.10_modifications_to_terms:
Modifications to Terms
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes, and continued use of the Platform constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.11_governing_law:
Governing Law
These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Egypt. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Egypt.
terms.12_contact_us:
Contact Us
For questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
üìß [support@yourappname.com]
üìç [Your Business Address]

About.title: About Us
About.description:
Jawad is Egypt‚Äôs first horse riding booking platform, founded in 2025 to bring the beauty, thrill, and tradition of horseback riding into the palm of your hand. Whether you‚Äôre a first-time rider, an experienced equestrian, or simply looking for a unique day out, Jawad makes it easy to discover and book unforgettable riding experiences across the country.

Our journey began with a simple dream: to make horse riding in Egypt as easy as booking with one click. From galloping along sandy beaches and riding beside the Nile, to exploring the pyramids or lush farms, our app connects you with trusted stables, skilled trainers, and well-cared-for horses ‚Äî instantly.

We believe riding is more than a sport; it‚Äôs a lifestyle, a connection with nature, and a window into Egypt‚Äôs heritage. That‚Äôs why Jawad offers:
- Easy online booking for rides, training, and photo sessions
- Verified stables and rider reviews
- Secure payments and flexible cancellations
- Custom experiences for families, groups, and events

By empowering local equestrian businesses with digital tools, we help them grow while giving riders more choices and confidence in their bookings.

Saddle up with Jawad ‚Äî your next horse riding adventure starts here.
